last_episode_to_air.name: We Two Are One
last_episode_to_air.overview: Shuichi and Clair attempt to strike a deal with the other members of their team, as Yoshioka reaches out to Elena.

name: Gleipnir
overview: Shuichi Kagaya is an ordinary high school kid in a boring little town. But when a beautiful classmate is caught in a warehouse fire, he discovers a mysterious power: he can transform into a furry dog with an oversized revolver and a zipper down his back. He saves the girl’s life, sharing his secret with her. But she’s searching for the sister who killed her family, and she doesn’t care how degrading it gets: she will use Shuichi to accomplish her mission…

episodes.name: Something Inside of Me
episodes.overview: Shuichi lives a normal high school life until a mysterious stranger threatens to reveal his incredible secret.

episodes.name: What It Means to Be Empty
episodes.overview: As the mysterious attacker closes in, Clair discovers something about Shuichi’s costume form… And that changes everything.

episodes.name: Elena
episodes.overview: Shuichi and Clair begin to search for Clair’s missing sister.

episodes.name: I Wish I Was Someone Else
episodes.overview: After encoutering Elena, Shuichi and Clair are guided to the source of all the mysterious happenings.

episodes.name: Crazy Enemies
episodes.overview: Clair and Shuichi wander into the mountains, and encounter a strange and powerful monster.

episodes.name: Gatherers
episodes.overview: After defeating an evil monster, Clair uses information he had to form a connection with a strange group of gatherers.

episodes.name: Metamorphosis
episodes.overview: Yoshioka and Shuichi encounter a fearsome foe while searching for her wallet.

episodes.name: Shadows in Memory
episodes.overview: Clair and her new allies recover Shuichi and Yoshioka. What did Yoshioka see when she was in Shuichi?

episodes.name: Staked Claims
episodes.overview: Koyanagi leads the team through the mountains, and they discover a suspicious and troubling mark.

episodes.name: Beautiful Flower
episodes.overview: A terrible ultimatum from a powerful enemy makes Clair, Shuichi, and their friends face an impossible decision.

episodes.name: The Price of Resolve
episodes.overview: Everyone returns to town, but they must come to terms with what happened in the mountains.

episodes.name: Where the Promise Was Made
episodes.overview: A few months earlier, a series of strange events happened among Shuichi and his childhood friends.

episodes.name: We Two Are One
episodes.overview: Shuichi and Clair attempt to strike a deal with the other members of their team, as Yoshioka reaches out to Elena.
